results.content: This course is exactly what I wanted to take. I’m an engineering graduate and want to start my career as a web developer, but I did not know anything about it. In this course, the instructor is teaching everything from basics to expert level and that’s what is helping me. Good stuff! Keep it up!!

results.content:
This is the most comprehensive course I have taken on Web development with React. Amaresh teaches everything from basics to the expert level. I like the fact that this course teaches everything with practical examples, end to end. 

This course is definitely recommended for freshers, who want to start their career in IT industry, as you can learn everything you need to be a professional web developer in this one course, even though you don't know anything about coding.
